item.title: 16 Errors
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

I downloaded a pretty sweet client, it originally had 70 errors but I got it down to 16.
I cannot figure out what is wrong

Here is Gui.java. http://pastebin.com/FLcs2b4G
And here is the error.
Thanks

;
